attributes.action: Reduce income tax for those in £30-£40k bracket
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that those who have a salary of £30-40k are earning too much to get any government allownances. Those earning £40k plus are generaly earning enough to compensate for higher tax rates. A lower tax of 5% below current will compensate middle managers a bring them on an equal footing with those subsidised in the lower end and the high earners.
